content:
Scientists are sending a rover to Mars. Their plan is to study a rectangular area of Mars represented by the grid below. On the grid, $1$ unit represents $1$ kilometer $(\text{km})$.

The rover will land at $(2.5,2)$, explore up to $(2.5,4.5)$, and then over to $(4,4.5)$. 

**Plot these points on the map.**

**What are the coordinates of the fourth vertex of the rectangle that the scientists plan to explore?**  
$($[[☃ input-number 1]], [[☃ input-number 2]]$)$

**What is the horizontal length of the rectangle?**  
[[☃ input-number 3]]

**What is the vertical length of the rectangle?**  
[[☃ input-number 4]]
[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
